citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:15 am on
03/19/2015.
Inspectors arrived at kennel, but no one home. Called cell phone and licensee said he could not return until the
afternoon.
Additional Inspectors
Vernon Kathryn, Animal Care Inspector
